divs: sighting detailsdark at 6 a.m. this morning, i went onto the porch and saw a large, bright, fire-like , round light shining between some trees over our rural valley that is almost completely dark at night except for an occasional light in a house window. i thought, why haven't i noticed this before? is it a forest fire on the mountain? but no fire is perfectly still and round, a glowing radiance, like this is. i tried to determine where it was but couldn't really because the light was so bright. it shone between some trees, so it was behind a rise northeast of our house, and it was either hovering over the valley northeast of us or possibly hovering\stationary on a mountain further east by a few miles. as i watched it, the light seemed brighter and larger, may have moved toward me, and lasted maybe 10 minutes. it struck me as a perfect, glowing radiance with star-like light prongs coming off all around the circumference. very beautiful. i went inside briefly, and when i came back outside the light was gone.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bayside
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Vivid, radiant, flame-colored, round light hovered about 10 minutes between some trees in front of a mountain in rural Jacoby Creek Valley. Never there before.
